## Overview

Select

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                    | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Disables the input             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Placeholder text for the input | `string`  | `''`    |
